head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: The SQL Extension

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: The SQL Extension

body.p: The sql:connect instruction now supports an attribute auto-commit="{yes|no}" to control this property of the JDBC connection.
A new instruction sql:execute is available to execute an arbitrary SQL statement (returning no result). It takes two attributes, connection and statement. For details see sql:execute
